name: Touch Shark
description:
** iOS not supported.

A fanart of Roman's christmas ( It is a furry detective game released on Steam. )

1. You can touch his chests and change some style as you like. Use Hand menu to change the hand style.

2. Click "status" will change his look and speed.

3. Hot switch will show a yellow light, make speed up and more sweat.

4. Use style menu to change his speed style. "Style Z" is recommended because it contains all the left styles.

Have fun!

My twitter: https://twitter.com/Zohar_wolf
